id.description: A unique identifier for the glyph, generally formed as its corresponding word with a dash and a number in the order the glyphs were coined.

word.description: The toki pona word which is written with this glyph.

word_id.description: The Linku id of the toki pona word this glyph writes.

creator_source.description: The source, usually a URL, where the glyph was coined.

creator.description: The name or names of those involved in creating this glyph.

primary.description: Whether this glyph is the main glyph used to write the toki pona word in `word`

deprecated.description: Whether the glyph is considered deprecated by its author(s)

image.description: A URL to an image of the sitelen pona glyph.

svg.description: A URL to an SVG of the sitelen pona glyph.

ligature.description: The ligature used to access this specific sitelen pona glyph.

ucsur.description: The UCSUR codepoint used to access this specific sitelen pona glyph.

usage.description: The percentage of respondents to the annual Linku word survey who report to use this glyph.

__schema0.description: A unique identifier for a given object in Linku. Generally named after the object.
